subnet_cidr_bits.description: The number of subnet bits for the CIDR. For example, specifying a value 8 for this parameter will create a CIDR with a mask of /24.

tags.description: A map of tags to add to all resources

vpc_cidr.description: The CIDR block for the VPC. Default value is a valid CIDR, but not acceptable by AWS and should be overridden
